snippet: It all starts so well. You meet venture capitalists and deliver a knockout pitch. They love it, you exchange business cards, they set out the next steps – and then you fall into the trap.
abstract: It all starts so well. You meet venture capitalists and deliver a knockout pitch. They love it, you exchange business cards, they set out the next steps – and then you fall into the trap.

headline.main: How Investors Can Kill a Business Without Losing Money Themselves
